mapper.select: SELECT noti_No as notiNo, noti_Title as notiTitle, noti_Name as notiName, noti_Content as notiContent, noti_Date as notiDate FROM NOTICE ORDER BY noti_Date DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{limit}
mapper.insert:

insert into notice (noti_no, noti_title, noti_name, noti_content, noti_date) values (#{notino}, #{notititle}, #{notiname}, #{noticontent}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT noti_No as notiNo, noti_Title as notiTitle, noti_Name as notiName, noti_Content as notiContent, noti_Date as notiDate FROM NOTICE WHERE noti_No = #{num}
